alert.note: Alert for Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 7:29PM CDT until August 05 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Walker County in central Alabama... Western Winston County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 729 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hackleburg to Gu-Win, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Haleyville, Carbon Hill, Lynn, Double Springs, Kansas, Nauvoo, Eldridge, Houston Recreational Area, Ashbank, Needmore, Winston Free State Barn, Ashridge, Natural Bridge, Weiss, Posey Field Airport, Clear Creek, Pebble, Delmar, Lupton and Sipsey River Rec Area. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
